title: In Six-Way Primary, Rep. Danny Davis Uses Congressional Funds to Election Ad Blitz, Complaint Says
description:
It’s not the first time Davis’s congressional office has been questioned about improper use of official funds for election races.

The post In Six-Way Primary, Rep. Danny Davis Uses Congressional Funds to Election Ad Blitz, Complaint Says appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Alabama Plans to Carry Out the First Execution Using Nitrogen Gas. A Lot Could Go Wrong.
description:
Lawyers for Kenneth Smith have warned that the method could cause him to suffer a stroke, choke to death on vomit, or be left in a vegetative state.

The post Alabama Plans to Carry Out the First Execution Using Nitrogen Gas. A Lot Could Go Wrong. appeared first on The Intercept.

title: 21 Israeli Troops Killed While Planting Explosives for a Controlled Demolition in Gaza
description:
The single largest IDF casualty event of the Gaza invasion is a symbol of Israel’s deepening quagmire.

The post 21 Israeli Troops Killed While Planting Explosives for a Controlled Demolition in Gaza appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Blinken Visits Nigeria as Questions Swirl About Civilian Deaths and U.S. Security Ties
description:
A State Department official said a drone strike that killed 120 Nigerians was no “attack” and urged press to focus on “fun” aspects of the secretary of state’s tour.

The post Blinken Visits Nigeria as Questions Swirl About Civilian Deaths and U.S. Security Ties appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Republicans Claim to Love Both Mothers and Children. Their Policies Prove They Love Neither.
description:
Republicans reject not just abortion, but also health programs and — this month — money for hungry families.

The post Republicans Claim to Love Both Mothers and Children. Their Policies Prove They Love Neither. appeared first on The Intercept.
